title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for correctly identifying BOTH scales of analysis
descriptions: The response does not provide a correct identification, or the response provides only one of the following correct identifications:
The response correctly identifies BOTH of the following identifications:

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct description
descriptions: The response does not correctly describe either of the following characteristics of specialty agriculture:
The response correctly describes ONE of the following characteristics of specialty agriculture:

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct description.
descriptions: The response does not correctly describe the spatial pattern of orange cultivation in Florida as any one of the following:
The response correctly describes the spatial pattern of orange cultivation in Florida as any one of the following:

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct description
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain any one of the following barriers to agricultural development that prevents orange cultivation in South Florida:
The response correctly explains ONE of the following barriers to agricultural development that prevents orange cultivation in South Florida:

title: Part E
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct explanation
descriptions: The response does not correctly explain either of the following barriers to agricultural development that prevents counties in North Florida from producing oranges as a crop:
The response correctly explains ONE of the following barriers to agricultural development that prevents counties in North Florida from producing oranges as a crop:

title: Part F
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct explanation
descriptions: The response does not provide a correct explanation of how the world map misrepresents orange cultivation in the United States using any one of the following:
The response correctly explains how the world map misrepresents orange cultivation in the United States using ONE of the following:

title: Part G
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

One point is earned for a correct explanation
descriptions: The response does not provide a correct explanation of how oranges are part of a commodity chain within multinational agribusiness corporations, using any one of the following:

The response correctly explains how oranges are part of a commodity chain within multinational agribusiness corporations that move oranges from growing regions to processing facilities and to stores, using ONE of the following:
